#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T, i;
	char str[100];
	cin >> T;
	if(T > 40)
		return 1;
	for(i=0; i<T; i++)
	{
		int count = 0;
		cin >> str;
		for(int j=0; str[j]!='\0'; j++)
			if(str[j]=='A' || str[j]=='D' || str[j]=='O' || str[j]=='P' || str[j]=='Q' || str[j]=='R')
				count++;
			else if(str[j]=='B')
				count += 2;
		cout << count << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
